title: Wisconsin Republican Sen. Ron Johnson will seek reelection

author: Associated Press
title: Wisconsin Republican Ron Johnson to run for re-election to Senate, reversing self-imposed term-limit vow

sentence: MADISON, Wis. Democratic U.S. Senate candidate Sarah Godlewski's first major policy plan of the campaign released Tuesday focuses on ways to improve life in rural Wisconsin, from bolstering access to health care, helping family farms survive and making broadband internet a public utility.
author: SCOTT BAUER
title: US Senate candidate Godlewski unveils rural Wisconsin plan

sentence: Mandela Barnes (D) leading that primary field with 23 percent support, with Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry trailing at 13 percent support, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson garnering five percent support and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski three percent.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Democratic group runs ad hitting Ron Johnson over Trump 2017 tax bill

sentence: Other top Democratic contenders include state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson.
